1. Mix 50ml/1.7 oz of white vinegar with 100ml/3.4oz of cold water to descale the bottle warmer. Switch on the bottle warmer, select the milk warming setting and let the appliance operate for 10 minutes. Leave the solution in the bottle warmer until all scale has dissolved.

entry.title: Grow Light Indoor Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brisita
Type: Gardening Tools
Price: 46.00

In only a few minutes, you can take your plant care to the next level.

4 adjustable arms with Red and Blue LED chips are just what you need to encourage healthy and rapid plant growth. This grow lamp is the indoor gardening answer you've been looking for, with an automatic on/off timer, lightning-fast installation, and full-spectrum light.

  • 3 light modes and 10 dimming options Indoor grow light includes red light, white light, and warm white light, you can choose 3 color modes (white light, red + warm white light, and mixed light ) and 10 dimming options ranging from 10% to 100%, which effectively supplemented the lack of natural sunlight and promoted plant growth in the vegetative or flowering stages
  • 4 Head Grow LightThe 4 head grow light has a flexible 360-degree rotating gooseneck, provides a much wider coverage area than the plant lights with shorter LED bulbs on the market, and meets the needs of multi-layered planting. With a non-slip gripper, they are sturdy enough to hold their position for better coverage around plants.
  • Auto power on and timer function Plant heat lamp supports plant growth with auto timer function. 3/9/12 hours of timer setting.
  • MULTIPLE APPLICATIONSThe Grow Light can be used for food production, plant propagation, indoor gardening, indoor hydroponics, and horticultural applications.
  • Service & Guarantee：24 months warranty to cover any issues. We offer a first-class support service to all our customers, If you have any questions, please contact us, we will solve it for you the first time.

4 Head Timing Grow Light

Red and Blue Spectrum

The EZORKAS Grow Light has the following specifications- 48 total lamp chips in total, with 32 red lights and 16 blue lights. The red wavelength is 660nm while the blue wavelength is 460nm. Each light is scientific and measured accordingly for optimal plant growth.

Our Grow Light has high energy-efficiency features and a high emergence rate. You get a balance of quality, safety, and long life.

  • Multiple Uses
  • Red and Blue Spectrum Combination
  • 3 Timing Modes
  • 9 Dimmable Modes
  • 3 Switch Modes
  • Adjustable Design

It can be set to automatically turn on and off every day. If you want the grow light to turn on 3 hours from 9 a.m to 12 p.m every day. You just need to turn it on at 9 a.m and set 3 hours.

Note:

- It is advisable to maintain a distance of 1.7 to 3.4 feet between the light and the plant.

- This grow light should be exposed to the plant twice a day with each session lasting for 6 hours for growth.

Control Panel

  • 3 Switch Modes: Red Light On, Blue Light On, and Both Red and Blue Lights On.
  • 9 Dimmable Modes: 20% to 100% Brightness.
  • 3 Timing Modes: 3, 9, and 12 hours.
  • Turn On/Off: Turn on/off is easy to control.

Easy To Use
The Grow Light is intuitive and easy to use. Simply connect the adapter to the device and the plug to a nearby power source. The tube is more flexible and convenient. Adjust the product to optimal distance and lighting direction or as needed.

Powerful Clip
The Grow Light clip can be attached to any compatible surface of up to 3 inches. It's made of high-quality materials and springs. The clip provides a very strong grip and won't come loose for a very long time.

Perfect Red/Blue Spectrum

The Blue LED chips to ensure plants take in more energy through the synthesis of chlorophyll to help in germination.

The Red LED chips to contribute to effective germination, and flowering, and enhances photosynthesis for better results.

Multiple Uses

The Grow Light can be used for food production, plant propagation, indoor gardening, indoor hydroponics, and horticultural applications.

-Promotes the growth of succulent plants such as cacti, etc.

-Improves the taste of vegetables such as cucumbers, tomatoes, etc.

-Improves flower quality and lengthens flowering time.

entry.title: Supply Portable 5 in 1 Ultrasonic Cavitation Machine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brisita
Type: Ultrasonic Cleaners
Price: 398.99

💎Including 5 functional heads, which can take care body and facial skin in all aspects.You can choose different modes according to your needs.

💎We provide one year warranty for the main machine and three months warranty for the accessories.We provide customer guide, after-sale service, problem solving.
Note: Products with electrical plugs are designed for use in the US. Outlets and voltage differ internationally and this product may require an adapter or converter for use in your destination. Please check compatibility before purchasing.


 

Instrument Function and Treatment Principles


1. Bipolar RF handle for eyes

Stick to enhance rejuvenation: use of positive and negative micro-current activation energy release skin cells, so that rapid synthesis of fibroblasts Collagen, elastic skin revert to the original compact, the skin causing t the skin to stimulate the muscle tension is increased, thereby gradually eliminate wrinkles, prevent skin aging, restoring skin elasticity, facial improvement.

2. Sextupole RF handle

Being integrated with the most advanced RF technology and radio frequency, the instrument may directly reach the deep-seated fat body and have the excellence of targeted positioning RF. In the fast-active state, fat cell tissue may generate friction heat, increase local temperature and remove excess fat and toxin from the body through the sweat gland, enterohepatic circulation, and lymph and ultimately achieve the effect of dissolving fat. With controlled depth technology, inlaid diamond particles of different sizes may rub skin along with its pattern, adjust suction strength by means of vacuum draw and rub with negative pressure strong force to directly explode thick fat. Thus, the effects are very obvious: Enhance blood circulation, accelerate the decomposition of fat, take away wastes, enhance the effect of removing cellulite, effectively improve the state of areolar tissue, remove stubborn fat and improve the sufficient absorption condition of diet products.


3. Quadrupole RF handle --Facial wrinkle elimination, tightening, and lifting

A capacitive coupling electrode is used for transmitting radio-wave energy and generating an electric field for entering into subcutaneous tissue through the skin surface. In the high-frequency

Of 450khz, this electric field changes its polarity 450,000 times per second. To reply to the rapid change in electrode, directions of electrical particles in the skin are also changed. By this time, natural electric resistance in the subcutaneous tissue moves and generates heat energy. As the papillary dermis collagen may immediately shrink when the temperature is within the range from 60 to 70 Celcius degree, after wrinkle treatment, the client may immediately sense the skin tightening effects as it is being lifted and firmed. When collagen is produced continuously, the thickness and density of the skin papillary dermis may be increased to remove wrinkles, eliminate scars, restore skin elasticity and gloss and make it be blonde and smooth. While collagen is increased, fresh skin is generated in the position of operation, and wrinkles are removed by a large number of cells. In addition, when the cortex without elasticity or that with a thick horny layer in the area with wrinkles is separated, surrounding skin will also be renewed.

4. Tripolar facial handle

Stick to enhance rejuvenation: use of positive and negative micro-current activation energy release skin cells, so that rapid synthesis of fibroblasts Collagen, elastic skin revert to the original compact, the skin causing t the skin to stimulate the muscle tension is increased, thereby gradually eliminate wrinkles, prevent skin aging, restoring skin elasticity, facial improvement.

 

NOTICE

  1. Be sure to use the special gel .
  2. Avoid knocking the us head.
  3. For avoiding burning the head, during operation, please prepare enough gel.
  4. Don’t stay in one place, avoid treating on the bone.
  5.  Don’t use disinfectant product to disinfect the us head. We suggest the wet cotton or dry towel enough.
  6. Check the machine power cord if it is connected well.
  7. If the machine will not use for a loing time, please switch off it, and power off.
  8.  Please take off all metal decoration from the operator and patient’s body.
  9. If continuous using 1 hour, please pause the machine about 10 minutes, then using again.
  10. During the operation, be sure not to accept other treatment.


Package Including

1 x Vacuum Biploar Head
1 x Tripolar RF Head for eyes&face
1 x Sextupolar RF for body
1 x Cold hammer
1 x Bio Skin lifting head
1 x Power supply cord

While few cornhole boards meet regulatory requirements, there is one that does. Star Cornhole Boards are a type of professional cornhole board.

Built for unparalleled fun and made in America.


The journey begins with the acquisition of high-quality components from US lumber suppliers. The Baltic Birch plywood is 2ft × 4ft x 1/2-inch thick and provides an exceptionally smooth playing surface. The frame is made of solid Poplar, which gives a strong foundation.


Following that, our artisans will print and build your new Star cornhole boards. They are then packaged in a secure and well-protected manner. The box's exterior perimeters are adorned with stylish American Cornhole Association packing tape. All of this is done in our production and warehouse site in Ohio.

Features:

REGULATION CORNHOLE SET
Our cornhole game set includes 2 regulation size (4 feet x 2 feet/3 feet x 2 feet) cornhole boards, 1 travel case, 1 bean bag tote and 8 all-weather (6 inch x 6 inch) cornhole bags(4 stars + 4 stripes/4 red + 4 blue).
DURAB LE CONSTRUCTION
Our regulation cor hole boards measure 4ft x 2ft/3ft x 2ft and are constructed from 100% premium solid wood, exceeding all ACA Regulation Standards. Two braces ensure it is sturdy and strong enough to prevent warping and bouncing.

POPULAR OUTDOOR GIFT
Toss a hand-sized bag filled with sand to win everyone's applause. Our regulation cornhole set is great for tailgates, barbeques, parties, weddings or just backyard fun and is sure to provide hours of entertainment for the whole family! It’s also a good choice for gifts.

EASY TO CARRY
Our regulation size 4ft x 2ft/3ft x 2ft cornhole boards with a foldable leg make the outdoor game set easy to store and transport. These boards weigh only 16 lbs each, which can be stored into a carrying case with a shoulder strap perfect for setting-up play on the beach or any location where hauling wooden boards is impractical.
